mapper.insert: insert into tb_reservation values( tb_reservation_seq.nextval, #{member}, sysdate, #{reserve_checkin}, #{reserve_checkout}, #{reserve_pay}, 0, #{room_no}, #{dorm_no}, #{pay_no}, #{pay_check} )
mapper.select: select reser.reserve_no, dorm.dorm_name, room.room_name, reser.member_id, reser.reserve_checkin, reser.reserve_date, reser.reserve_checkout, reser.reserve_pay, room.room_picture, reser.reserve_person from tb_reservation reser, tb_room room, tb_dorm dorm where reser.room_no = room.room_no and reser.dorm_no = room.dorm_no and room.dorm_no = dorm.dorm_no and reser.member_id = #{member} order by reserve_no desc
select pay_no from tb_reservation where reserve_no = #{reserve_no}
